definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: doubtful word; perh. (for *[[שֶׁאֶת]]) din of battle (= [[שָׁאוֹן]]); Thes al. devastation, cf. [[שְׁאִיׇּה]]; either meaning suits ´[[הַשּׁ]]: La 3:47 (‖[[הַשָָּׁבֶר ]]; but We:Comp.Hex. 2, 351, from II. [[שׁוא]], desolation); contr. (acc. to Thes and most) < [[שֵׁת]], in [[בְּנֵי שֵׁת]] Nu 24:l7(J) sons of  (battle-)din (warriors, = [[שָׁאוֹן בְּנֵי]] in ‖ Je 48:45); Vrss take [[שֵׁת]] here as n.pr.; Gray prop. [[שֵׂת]] = [[שְׂאֵת]], pride, or reading as Je cf. We:Comp. 351.
